## Dictionary.getClass() method

Retrieves a type or aspect definition by it's qname

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getClass(qname: QNameWithTypeTagConsumer<QNameTypeTag.CLASS>): ClassDefinition | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  qname | QNameWithTypeTagConsumer&lt;QNameTypeTag.CLASS&gt; | The qualified name of the class to fetch |

<b>Returns:</b>

ClassDefinition \| null

A class definition, or null when no class exists for the requested qname
